code: import axios from"axios";export function apiCall(url,method,data){let headers=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:{"Authorization":localStorage.getItem('access_token')};return axios({baseURL:"http://localhost:8080",url,method,data,headers});}export function getAccessToken(){setInterval(()=>{apiCall("/auth/refresh",'get',null,{refresh_token:localStorage.getItem("refresh_token")}).then(_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;localStorage.setItem("access_token",data);});},1000*10-1000);}
